meanings.definition: Develop or improve (something) by making changes to its structure or form.
meanings.sent1: The city is redeveloping the old factory into a modern office building.
meanings.sent2: The company is redeveloping its website to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: They are redeveloping the garden to make it look like a magical forest.
meanings.sent4: Her skills are redeveloping like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The artist is redeveloping the painting, adding vibrant colors and new details.

meanings.sent1: The neighborhood is redeveloping after the storm damage.
meanings.sent2: The software is redeveloping to fix the bugs in the system.
meanings.sent3: The old book is redeveloping its plot to surprise the readers.
meanings.sent4: His ideas are redeveloping like seeds sprouting in fertile soil.
meanings.sent5: The town is redeveloping its community center, bringing new life to the area.
